cards.name: HOLD THEM BACK
cards.descriptionTop: Destroy 1 'triangle' ground unit. (It will not roll dice this round.)

cards.name: ROGUE ONE
cards.descriptionTop: If you retreat at least 1 unit this combat round, you may rescue 1 captured leader or remove 1 target marker from this system.
cards.descriptionBottom: Imperial ground units cannot remove damage using 'cross-sabers' this round.

cards.name: ESCAPE PLAN
cards.descriptionTop: You may immediately retreat. If you do, cancel the Imperial tactic card.
cards.descriptionBottom: Next combat round, the Imperial player cannot play a ground tactic card.

cards.name: PLANETARY SHIELD
cards.descriptionTop: After the Imperial player assigns damage, deal up to 3 damage to 1 Shield Generator. Then remove that much damage from ground units.
cards.descriptionBottom: Until the end of the combat, during the ground battles, you resolve your attacks after the Imperial player

cards.name: TAKE COVER
cards.descriptionTop: Prevent 2 red hits [o] and 2 black hits [o].
cards.descriptionBottom: Prevent 1 red hit [o] and 1 black hit [o].

cards.name: TOW CABLES
cards.descriptionTop: Deal 4 damage to 1 AT-AT or AT-ST.

cards.name: CONFRONTATION
cards.descriptionTop: If the last Imperial ground unit is destroyed during this combat round, place a damage token under an Imperial leader in this system and remove this card from the game. At the end of this Command Phase, that leader is eliminated.
cards.descriptionBottom: You may play 1 additional ground tactic card.
